description.p: Your life is dedicated to the pursuit of the world’s greatest natural predators, the dragons. From the majesty of their wings to the ferocity of their flames, you have witnessed the chaos and destruction that these creatures can cause. Driven by a fierce determination to prevent them from spreading further terror, you have spent years studying every aspect of their existence. You have learned the nuances of their language, the intricacies of their customs, and the depths of their abilities. You have delved into the history of the world to better understand their influence, their origins, and their place in the tapestry of time.

ul.li: Equipment: A dragon scale, a memento form your home regions, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp.

description.p: As a dragon hunter, you are consumed by your mission to rid the world of these powerful creatures. You are single-minded in your pursuit, driven by an unshakeable belief in the importance of your work. You relish the thrill of the hunt, the rush of adrenaline as you face down these fearsome beasts. You are highly knowledgeable about dragons and their behavior, a living encyclopedia of lore and legend. You are willing to take great risks to achieve your goals, venturing into dangerous territory and facing overwhelming odds. However, you are not invincible, and you may struggle with the toll that your lifestyle takes on your personal relationships and health. The constant vigilance, the solitude, and the fear of failure can wear on even the most stalwart soul.

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I’ve never seen a dragon before. In fact, the mere thought of facing such an unrelenting force scares me out of my wits. Regardless, I know it is my mission.
I am relentlessly devoted to my mission and I will do whatever I can to accomplish it, ignoring any distractions.
I am always willing to acquire objects of draconic origin, sometimes paying much more than their worth.
Part of me dreams of taming a dragon and riding on its back.
I harbor a visceral, overpowering hatred for dragons and draconic creatures, even those who seem intelligent and civilized.
I usually make dozens of drawings of dragon anatomy, their lairs and symbols.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Preservation. I believe dragons are a fundamental part of the world. Though we must protect ourselves from them, indiscriminate hunt might irreparably harm nature’s balance. (Lawful)
Change. The evil dragons’ reign of terror must end, bringing a new era of freedom for humanity. (Good)
Fame. I wish to be known as the greatest dragonslayer the world has ever seen. Only then will I be truly satisfied. (Any)
Vengeance. No matter the consequences, I am ready to accept them if it means I will exact my revenge on a dragon. (Chaotic)
Knowledge. I must learn all there is to know about dragons. Then I’ll be ready to face them. (Any)
Power. More than hunting dragons, what I wish is to capture one, using its power to take whatever I want. (Evil)

select.name: Bond
select.item: A roving dragon destroyed my village, and that’s why I devote myself to hunting down these beasts.
I’m secretly in love for another hunter and I wish to prove myself to him/her before making my love known.
I have a master who taught me on the nature and power of the dragons.
I owe my life to my fellow hunters. I would never be able to betray or leave a single one of them behind.
I grew up in a small city in a dragon’s territory. One day I hope to return and free my people.
When I was young, a great hero saved me from a dragon. I have followed his steps ever since in order to become a hero myself.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: My journey has severed my ties to any human relations I had. Nowadays I find it extremely hard to relate and social interactions are a true challenge.
I am always paranoid about an imminent dragon attack,
My study on dragons made me arrogant towards unlearned people. I have no patience for those who I deem ignorant.
I made a terrible mistake a couple years ago and this has cost a few lives. I hope to keep this mistake a secret from everyone.
I squander any spare money I have on drinking. Alcohol is my courage elixir for facing dragons… and forgetting the horrors I witnessed.
Just like a dragon, I hoard treasures and have a peculiar taste for gold and precious stones.

description.p: Through your long years of dragon hunting, you have built up a vast network of contacts. From magic scholars to local rangers and renegade dragonblades, you have gleaned valuable insights and knowledge about draconic activity. Your keen eye for detail and your experience in the field allow you to identify patterns and supernatural phenomena that others might miss.

When arriving at a city you can reach for your contacts to have access to privileged information regarding dragon activities, their schemes as well as the presence and actions of their servants in the region.
